titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an John Maynard Keynes, [3. 12. 1928]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original an der King's College Library in Cambridge; Kopie im BA. Publiziert (deutsch: Briefe, S. 165; Cambridge Letters, S. 225).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: J M KEYNES KINGS COLLEGE CAMBRIDGE ENGLAND =
AM STILL UNABLE TO TRAVEL LETTER FOLLOWS = LUDWIG +
